remarks.format: ## Remarks `partUri` 必须是有效[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]根据所使用的格式正确[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *统一资源标识符 (URI) 的通用语法*规范和[开放打包约定](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)规范。`partUri` must be valid [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification and the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255) specification. 使用此构造函数时部件的不立即知道，并且将会更高版本时调用。Use this constructor when the of the part is not immediately known and will be set later when is called. 默认情况下部件的属性初始化为。By default, the property of the part is initialized to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `partUri` 必须是有效[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]根据所使用的格式正确[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *统一资源标识符 (URI) 的通用语法*规范和[开放打包约定](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)规范。`partUri` must be valid [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification and the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255) specification. 默认情况下部件的属性初始化为。By default, the property of the part is initialized to . `contentType` 必须是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]根据所使用的类型正确[RFC 2616](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *超文本传输协议 HTTP*，部分 3.7。`contentType` must be a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type formed in accordance with the [RFC 2616](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *Hypertext Transfer Protocol - HTTP*, Section 3.7. 下表显示了内容的示例[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]中使用的类型[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文档。The following table shows an example of the content [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] types used in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documents. |描述Description|内容类型Content Type| |-----------------|------------------| |字体Font|application/vnd.ms-opentypeapplication/vnd.ms-opentype| |ICC 配置文件ICC profile|application/vnd.ms-color.iccprofileapplication/vnd.ms-color.iccprofile| |JPEG 图像JPEG image|image/jpegimage/jpeg| |经过模糊处理的字体Obfuscated font|application/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentypeapplication/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentype| |PNG 图像PNG image|image/pngimage/png| |PrintTicketPrintTicket|application/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xmlapplication/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xml| |TIFF 图像TIFF image|图像/tiffimage/tiff| |Windows Media 照片图像Windows Media Photo image|image/vnd.ms-photoimage/vnd.ms-photo|

remarks.format: ## Remarks `partUri` 必须是有效[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]根据所使用的格式正确[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *统一资源标识符 (URI) 的通用语法*规范和[开放打包约定](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)规范。`partUri` must be valid [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification and the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255) specification. `contentType` 必须是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]根据所使用的类型正确[RFC 2616](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *超文本传输协议 HTTP*，部分 3.7。`contentType` must be a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type formed in accordance with the [RFC 2616](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *Hypertext Transfer Protocol - HTTP*, Section 3.7. 下表显示了内容的示例[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]中使用的类型[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文档。The following table shows an example of the content [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] types used in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documents. |描述Description|内容类型Content Type| |-----------------|------------------| |字体Font|application/vnd.ms-opentypeapplication/vnd.ms-opentype| |ICC 配置文件ICC profile|application/vnd.ms-color.iccprofileapplication/vnd.ms-color.iccprofile| |JPEG 图像JPEG image|image/jpegimage/jpeg| |经过模糊处理的字体Obfuscated font|application/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentypeapplication/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentype| |PNG 图像PNG image|image/pngimage/png| |PrintTicketPrintTicket|application/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xmlapplication/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xml| |TIFF 图像TIFF image|图像/tiffimage/tiff| |Windows Media 照片图像Windows Media Photo image|image/vnd.ms-photoimage/vnd.ms-photo|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个只读属性，可以访问仅当父处于打开状态。 is a read-only property that can be accessed only when the parent is open. 属性自动设置构造函数。The property is automatically set by the constructor. 通过构造函数中，设置后不能更改。After it is set by the constructor, the cannot be changed. 属性是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]类型根据所使用的格式正确[RFC 2616](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *超文本传输协议 HTTP*，部分 3.7。The property is a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type formed in accordance with the [RFC 2616](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *Hypertext Transfer Protocol - HTTP*, Section 3.7. 下表显示了内容的示例[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]中使用的类型[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文档。The following table shows an example of the content [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] types used in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documents. |描述Description|内容类型Content Type| |-----------------|------------------| |字体Font|application/vnd.ms-opentypeapplication/vnd.ms-opentype| |ICC 配置文件ICC profile|application/vnd.ms-color.iccprofileapplication/vnd.ms-color.iccprofile| |JPEG 图像JPEG image|image/jpegimage/jpeg| |经过模糊处理的字体Obfuscated font|application/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentypeapplication/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentype| |PNG 图像PNG image|image/pngimage/png| |PrintTicketPrintTicket|application/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xmlapplication/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xml| |TIFF 图像TIFF image|图像/tiffimage/tiff| |Windows Media 照片图像Windows Media Photo image|image/vnd.ms-photoimage/vnd.ms-photo|

summary.span: Creates a part-level relationship between this to a specified target or external resource.

span.span: Creates a part-level relationship between this to a specified target or external resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个部件级关系定义此部件和目标部件或资源之间的关联。A part-level relationship defines an association between this part and a target part or resource. 部件级关系可以是两种形式之一。A part-level relationship can be one of two forms. - 源之间到目标内。Between a source to a target inside the . - 源之间到包外部的目标资源。Between a source to a target resource outside the package. 在部件关系源部件被视为此关系的"所有者"。In a part-relationship the source part is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 删除源部件时，还删除此部分拥有的所有关系。When the source part is deleted, all the relationships owned by the part are also deleted. 创建或删除关系的过程不会以物理方式更改目标部件或以任何方式的资源。The process of creating or deleting the relationship does not physically alter the target part or resource in any way. 方法不会以物理方式更改的源部分中，或目标部件或以任何方式的资源。The method does not physically change either the source part, or the target part or resource in any way. 关系的目标不能为另一个关系。The target of a relationship cannot be another relationship. 有关包关系的详细信息，请参阅部分 1.3*开放式打包约定 (OPC)* 规范可在下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information about package relationships see section 1.3 of the *Open Packaging Conventions (OPC)* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). 详细了解 XPS 文档，请参阅*Open XML 纸张规范 (XPS)* 下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000)。For more information about XPS documents see the *Open XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000).

span.span: The part-level relationship between this to the target or external resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个部件级关系定义此部件和目标部件或资源之间的关联。A part-level relationship defines an association between this part and a target part or resource. 部件级关系可以是两种形式之一。A part-level relationship can be one of two forms. - 源之间到目标内。Between a source to a target inside the . - 源之间到包外部的目标资源。Between a source to a target resource outside the package. 在部件关系源部件被视为此关系的"所有者"。In a part-relationship the source part is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 删除源部件时，还删除此部分拥有的所有关系。When the source part is deleted, all the relationships owned by the part are also deleted. 创建或删除关系的过程不会以物理方式更改目标部件或以任何方式的资源。The process of creating or deleting the relationship does not physically alter the target part or resource in any way. 方法不会以物理方式更改的源部分中，或目标部件或以任何方式的资源。The method does not physically change either the source part, or the target part or resource in any way. 关系的目标不能为另一个关系。The target of a relationship cannot be another relationship. 如果`targetMode`指定为，`targetUri`必须是格式根据所使用的相对 URI [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *统一资源标识符 (URI) 的通用语法*规范。If `targetMode` is specified as , `targetUri` must be a relative URI that is formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification. 内部的相对 URI 可以是任一绝对路径开头的正斜杠 （"/"） 字符如"/ page1.xaml"或"/ images/picture4.jpg"，或相对路径，如".../ imagespicture1.jpg"可解析对包根目录 （"/"） 作为基 URI。The internal relative URI can be either an absolute path that starts with a forward slash ("/") character such as "/page1.xaml" or "/images/picture4.jpg", or a relative path such as "../imagespicture1.jpg" that resolves against the package root ("/") as the base URI. 如果`targetMode`指定为，`targetUri`可以是任一绝对或相对 URI 根据所使用的格式正确[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *统一资源标识符 (URI) 泛型语法*规范。If `targetMode` is specified as , `targetUri` can be either an absolute or relative URI formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification. "http://www.microsoft.com/page2.xml"是绝对 URI 引用的外部目标资源"page2.xml"的一个示例。"http://www.microsoft.com/page2.xml" is an example of an absolute URI that references an external target resource "page2.xml". "images/picture1.jpg"是一个相对 URI，还引用外部目标资源"1.jpg"但并解析对包本身的 URI 的示例。"images/picture1.jpg" is an example of a relative URI that also references an external target resource "1.jpg" but which resolves against the URI of the package itself. `relationshipType` 必须是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]根据构成[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *统一资源标识符 (URI) 的通用语法*规范。`relationshipType` must be a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that is formed according to the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification. 不同的包类型可以定义不同的部件级关系类型。Different package types can define different part-level relationship types. 下表显示了部分级`relationshipType`Uri 定义的文档，符合*Open XML 纸张规范 (XPS)*。The following table shows the part-level `relationshipType` URIs defined for documents that conform to the *Open XML Paper Specification (XPS)*. |XPS 文档部件级关系XPS Document Part-Level Relationship|关系类型 URIRelationship Type URI| |-------------------------------------------|---------------------------| |数字签名定义Digital Signature Definitions|[http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/signature-definitions](http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/signature-definitions)| MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship CreateRelationship (Uri targetUri, System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode targetMode, string relationshipType, string id);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship CreateRelationship(class System.Uri targetUri, valuetype System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode targetMode, string relationshipType, string id) cil managed
public: System::IO::Packaging::PackageRelationship ^ CreateRelationship(Uri ^ targetUri, System::IO::Packaging::TargetMode targetMode, System::String ^ relationshipType, System::String ^ id);
member this.CreateRelationship : Uri * System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode * string * string -> System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship

param.name: targetUri
param.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the target part.

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the target part.

param.name: targetMode
param.span: One of the enumeration values.

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

param.span: For example, if the target part is inside the ; or if the target is a resource outside the .

span.span: For example, if the target part is inside the ; or if the target is a resource outside the .

param.name: relationshipType
param.span: The role of the relationship.

span.span: The role of the relationship.

param.name: id
param.span: A unique ID for the relationship.

span.span: A unique ID for the relationship.

summary.span: Creates a part-level relationship between this to a specified target or external resource.

span.span: Creates a part-level relationship between this to a specified target or external resource.

returns.span: The part-level relationship between this to the target or external resource.

span.span: The part-level relationship between this to the target or external resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个部件级关系定义此部件和目标部件或资源之间的关联。A part-level relationship defines an association between this part and a target part or resource. 部件级关系可以是两种形式之一。A part-level relationship can be one of two forms. - 源之间到目标内。Between a source to a target inside the . - 源之间到包外部的目标资源。Between a source to a target resource outside the package. 在部件关系源部件被视为此关系的"所有者"。In a part-relationship the source part is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 删除源部件时，还删除此部分拥有的所有关系。When the source part is deleted, all the relationships owned by the part are also deleted. 创建或删除关系的过程不会以物理方式更改目标部件或以任何方式的资源。The process of creating or deleting the relationship does not physically alter the target part or resource in any way. `id` 必须是有效的 XML 标识符。`id` must be a valid XML identifier. `id`类型是 xsd:ID，而且必须遵循中所规定的命名约定*XML 架构第 2 部分： 数据类型*规范 (请参阅[ https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID ](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID))。The `id` type is xsd:ID and must follow the naming conventions prescribed in the *XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes* specification (see [https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID)). 方法不会以物理方式更改的源部分中，或目标部件或以任何方式的资源。The method does not physically change either the source part, or the target part or resource in any way. 关系的目标不能为另一个关系。The target of a relationship cannot be another relationship. 如果`targetMode`指定为，`targetUri`必须是格式根据所使用的相对 URI [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *统一资源标识符 (URI) 的通用语法*规范。If `targetMode` is specified as , `targetUri` must be a relative URI that is formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification. 内部的相对 URI 可以是任一绝对路径开头的正斜杠 （"/"） 字符如"/ page1.xaml"或"/ images/picture4.jpg"，或相对路径，如".../ imagespicture1.jpg"可解析对包根目录 （"/"） 作为基 URI。The internal relative URI can be either an absolute path that starts with a forward slash ("/") character such as "/page1.xaml" or "/images/picture4.jpg", or a relative path such as "../imagespicture1.jpg" that resolves against the package root ("/") as the base URI. 如果`targetMode`指定为，`targetUri`可以是任一绝对或相对 URI 根据所使用的格式正确[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *统一资源标识符 (URI) 泛型语法*规范。If `targetMode` is specified as , `targetUri` can be either an absolute or relative URI formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification. "http://www.microsoft.com/page2.xml"是绝对 URI 引用的外部目标资源"page2.xml"的一个示例。"http://www.microsoft.com/page2.xml" is an example of an absolute URI that references an external target resource "page2.xml". "images/picture1.jpg"是一个相对 URI，还引用外部目标资源"1.jpg"但并解析对包本身的 URI 的示例。"images/picture1.jpg" is an example of a relative URI that also references an external target resource "1.jpg" but which resolves against the URI of the package itself. `relationshipType` 必须是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]根据构成[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *统一资源标识符 (URI) 的通用语法*规范。`relationshipType` must be a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that is formed according to the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification. 不同的包类型可以定义不同的部件级关系类型。Different package types can define different part-level relationship types. 下表显示了部分级`relationshipType`Uri 定义的文档，符合*Open XML 纸张规范 (XPS)*。The following table shows the part-level `relationshipType` URIs defined for documents that conform to the *Open XML Paper Specification (XPS)*. |XPS 文档部件级关系XPS Document Part-Level Relationship|关系类型 URIRelationship Type URI| |-------------------------------------------|---------------------------| |数字签名定义Digital Signature Definitions|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/signature-definitions| |DiscardControlDiscardControl|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/discard-control| |DocumentStructureDocumentStructure|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/documentstructure| |PrintTicketPrintTicket|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/printticket| |所需的资源Required Resource|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/required-resource| |受限的字体Restricted Font|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/restricted-font| |StartPartStartPart|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/fixedrepresentation| |StoryFragmentsStoryFragments|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/storyfragments| 有关包关系的详细信息，请参阅部分 1.3*开放式打包约定 (OPC)* 规范可在下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information about package relationships see section 1.3 of the *Open Packaging Conventions (OPC)* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). 详细了解 XPS 文档，请参阅*Open XML 纸张规范 (XPS)* 下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000)。For more information about XPS documents see the *Open XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `id` 必须是有效的 XML 标识符。`id` must be a valid XML identifier. `id`类型是 xsd:ID，而且必须遵循中所规定的命名约定*XML 架构第 2 部分： 数据类型*规范 (请参阅[ https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID ](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID))。The `id` type is xsd:ID and must follow the naming conventions prescribed in the *XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes* specification (see [https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID)). 如果指定`id`不符没有关系删除任何所拥有的此部分的关系，并且不会引发异常。If the specified `id` does not match the for any of the relationships that are owned by this part, no relationship is deleted and no exception is thrown. 删除指定的关系，以外方法不会以物理方式更改此部分或目标部件。Other than deleting the specified relationship, the method does not physically change either this part or the target part.

summary.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type of the part content.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type of the part content.

returns.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type of the part content.

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type of the part content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的一个虚拟方法抽象基类。 is a virtual method of the abstract base class. 仅在其中不能在构造时提供的内容类型的值的派生类型中实现此方法或计算内容类型值进行重要或成本高昂的操作。Implement this method only in derived types where the value for the content type cannot be provided at the time of construction, or if calculating the content type value is a nontrivial or costly operation. 返回值必须是有效[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]内容类型。The return value must be a valid [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] content type. 派生的类可以调用初始化为默认值派生的类的属性。Derived classes can call to initialize the property of the derived class to a default value. 之后属性已设置它不能更改。After the property has been set it cannot be changed.

exception.span: The derived class does not provide an override implementation required for the method.

span.span: The derived class does not provide an override implementation required for the method.

span.para: 在内部调用派生方法实际打开并返回一部分数据流基于派生类中实现的物理格式。默认情况下子类的抽象实现提供和使用类。在默认操作中，在内部调用的类，以从打开并返回部分数据流的 ZIP 文件。

internally calls the derived method to actually open and return the part data stream based on the physical format implemented in the derived class. By default, the subclass implementation of the abstract class is provided and used. In the default operation, internally calls of the class to open and return the part data stream from a ZIP file.

span.para: 在内部调用派生方法实际打开并返回一部分数据流基于派生类中实现的物理格式。默认情况下子类的抽象实现提供和使用类。在默认操作中，在内部调用的类，以从打开并返回部分数据流的 ZIP 文件。

internally calls the derived method to actually open and return the part data stream based on the physical format implemented in the derived class. By default, the subclass implementation of the abstract class is provided and used. In the default operation, internally calls of the class to open and return the part data stream from a ZIP file.

MemberSignature.Value: protected abstract System.IO.Stream GetStreamCore (System.IO.FileMode mode, System.IO.FileAccess access);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IO.Stream GetStreamCore(valuetype System.IO.FileMode mode, valuetype System.IO.FileAccess access) cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function GetStreamCore (mode As FileMode, access As FileAccess) As Stream
protected: abstract System::IO::Stream ^ GetStreamCore(System::IO::FileMode mode, System::IO::FileAccess access);
abstract member GetStreamCore : System.IO.FileMode * System.IO.FileAccess -> System.IO.Stream

param.name: mode
param.span: The I/O mode in which to open the content stream.

span.span: The I/O mode in which to open the content stream.

param.name: access
param.span: The access permissions to use in opening the content stream.

span.span: The access permissions to use in opening the content stream.

summary.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the part content stream opened with a specified and .

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the part content stream opened with a specified and .

returns.span: The content data stream of the part.

span.span: The content data stream of the part.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序不应调用直接，而应调用。Applications should not call directly, but instead should call .

span.para: 派生实现应作出任何假设订单或由执行的操作调用它的方法。
The derived implementation should make no assumptions about the order or operations performed by the method that calls it.
派生方法由调用方法打开并返回一部分数据流基于派生类中实现的物理格式。默认情况下子类的抽象实现提供和使用类。在默认操作中，在内部调用的类，以从打开并返回部分数据流的 ZIP 文件。

The derived method is called by the methods to open and return the part data stream based on the physical format implemented in the derived class. By default, the subclass implementation of the abstract class is provided and used. In the default operation, internally calls of the class to open and return the part data stream from a ZIP file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个只读属性，可以访问仅当父处于打开状态。 is a read-only property that can be accessed only when the parent is open. 属性自动设置构造函数。The property is automatically set by the constructor. 通过构造函数中，父设置后无法更改该部件的。After it is set by the constructor, the parent for the part cannot be changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `id` 必须是有效的 XML 标识符。`id` must be a valid XML identifier. `id`类型是 xsd:ID，而且必须遵循中所规定的命名约定*XML 架构第 2 部分： 数据类型*规范 (请参阅[ https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID ](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID))。The `id` type is xsd:ID and must follow the naming conventions prescribed in the *XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes* specification (see [https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID)).
